rcZeitWindowTogglePrimary.title: Unified Window Selector: Hold Open
rcZeitWindowTogglePrimary.desc: Opens the unified window selector when pressed with the secondary input, closes it when released and opens the selected window.

rcZeitWindowToggleSecondary.title: Unified Window Selector: Cycle Through
rcZeitWindowToggleSecondary.desc: The unified window selector opens when this is pressed in combination with the primary input. Release and press this again to select the next window.

rcZeitProfileWindowToggle.title: Profile Manager
rcZeitProfileWindowToggle.desc: Shows or hides the profile manager window.

rcZeitMainWindowToggle.title: Profile Editor
rcZeitMainWindowToggle.desc: Shows or hides the profile editor window.

rcZeitPhotoWindowToggle.title: Photo Tool
rcZeitPhotoWindowToggle.desc: Shows or hides the photo tool window.

rcZeitSettingsWindowToggle.title: Settings
rcZeitSettingsWindowToggle.desc: Shows or hides the settings window.
